extensionDescription.message: Shows a simple icon, if IPv6 or IPv4 was used for the request of the site.

pageActionDefaultTooltip.description: The default tooltip text of the icon, when no info is available (yet)

pageActionTooltip.description: The tooltip text of the icon

pageActionCached.description: Indicate something was cached (used instead of the ip in the tooltip, if the IP is not available)

popupDefaultText.message: Please refresh the site or start browsing, to see information
popupDefaultText.description: The default text on the popup, when nothing was loaded (yet)

popupTooltipLoadedIpVersion.description: The text of the tooltip, when hover on the IPv4/IPv6 icon in the popup

popupTooltipLoadedNAT64.description: The text of the tooltip, when hover on the IP Icon in the popup and NAT64 was detected

popupTooltipLoadedCache.description: The text of the tooltip, when hover on the Cache icon in the popup

popupTooltipLoadedProxy.description: The text of the tooltip, when hover on an element loaded via proxy in the popup

popupTooltipCopyIp.message: Click here to copy the IP to the clipboard
popupTooltipCopyIp.description: The text of the tooltip, when hover on the ip element

popupTooltipSecureConnection.description: The text of the tooltip, when hover on the secure icon in the popup

popupTooltipUnsecureConnection.description: The text of the tooltip, when hover on the unsecure icon in the popup

popupTooltipMixedConnection.description: The text of the tooltip, when hover on the mixed (Security) icon in the popup
